DOC.brief_summary: Given preliminary data animal ( proprietary data ) show XXS ( mixture natural polyphenolic extract edible plant ) significant favourable effect oxidative stress notably decrease certain marker oxidative stress plasma lipid parameter , investigator proposes study effect 6 month treatment XXS control study placebo population person present lipid profile upper limit normal .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effects XXS Oxidative Stress Patients With Mild Moderate Hyperlipidemia
DOC.criteria: Persons provide write consent Persons age 18 year Presenting LDL level 1.30 1.90 g/l and/or triglyceride level 1.5 3 g/l Persons without national health insurance cover Pregnant breastfeed woman Adults guardianship Patients diabetes ( InsulinDependent Diabetes ( IDD ) NonInsulinDependent Diabetes NIDD ) Patients coronary artery disease Patients atherosclerosis HDL > 0.80 g/l receive treatment lipidlowering agent ( statin , fibrates , ezetimibe Ω3 ) Consuming vitamin supplement ( A , C , E… ) Consuming oligoelements mineral ( Se , Zn , Ca… ) Renal insufficiency ( creatinine clearance < 30 ml/min calculate accord Modification Diet Renal Disease ( MDRD ) )
